name: Baby Care
shortDescription: Safe and loving babysitting services for your little ones.
description: Our Baby Care service provides trained and trusted caregivers to look after your children with love, patience, and responsibility. From daily supervision to full-time babysitting, we ensure a safe and nurturing environment for your child at home.

name: Elderly Care
shortDescription: Compassionate and respectful care for elderly family members.
description: Our Elderly Care service is designed to support seniors with daily activities, companionship, and personal care. We focus on dignity, comfort, and emotional well-being while ensuring medical and physical support when needed.

name: Sick People Care
shortDescription: Reliable home care for sick or recovering individuals.
description: Our Sick Care service offers professional caregivers for patients recovering from illness or surgery. We provide attentive care, basic medical support, and emotional comfort in the safety of your home.
